description: Starts the workflow when HubSpot events occur

properties.name: eventsUi
properties.description: To get notified if any company is created in a customer's account

properties.name: Company Deleted
properties.description: To get notified if any company is deleted in a customer's account

properties.name: Company Property Changed
properties.description: To get notified if a specified property is changed for any company in a customer's account

properties.name: Contact Created
properties.description: To get notified if any contact is created in a customer's account

properties.name: Contact Deleted
properties.description: To get notified if any contact is deleted in a customer's account

properties.name: Contact Privacy Deleted
properties.description: To get notified if a contact is deleted for privacy compliance reasons

properties.name: Contact Property Changed
properties.description: To get notified if a specified property is changed for any contact in a customer's account

properties.name: Conversation Creation
properties.description: To get notified if a new thread is created in an account

properties.name: Conversation Deletion
properties.description: To get notified if a thread is archived or soft-deleted in an account

properties.name: Conversation New Message
properties.description: To get notified if a new message on a thread has been received

properties.name: Conversation Privacy Deletion
properties.description: To get notified if a thread is permanently deleted in an account

properties.name: Conversation Property Change
properties.description: To get notified if a property on a thread has been changed

properties.name: Deal Created
properties.description: To get notified if any deal is created in a customer's account

properties.name: Deal Deleted
properties.description: To get notified if any deal is deleted in a customer's account

properties.name: Deal Property Changed
properties.description: To get notified if a specified property is changed for any deal in a customer's account

properties.name: Ticket Created
properties.description: To get notified if a ticket is created in a customer's account

properties.name: Ticket Deleted
properties.description: To get notified if any ticket is deleted in a customer's account

properties.name: Ticket Property Changed
properties.description: To get notified if a specified property is changed for any ticket in a customer's account

properties.name: property
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
